2011-03-16

BtVS: Phases / Only he used more words than that... and a globe

OK... I know the Oz = Cool thing is getting a bit boring (and doesn't really need to be said any more) but this is an Oz episode, this is where Oz gets to be who he really is - he mutilates animals and attempts to kill Willow and at the end we love him even more... A great episode... possibly my favourite so far - I know I'm probably alone in that but... you know... Oz!


He… he said he was going through all these changes, and then he went through all these… changes

And here's a live version of Cat Power playing Werewolf from You Are Free.
